projects.name: Personal Garden Hydroponics
projects.notes: In a collaborative venture with my wife, we purchased an 8000 sq. ft. lot and embarked on transforming it into an urban farm-to-table event space. At the heart of our project is the garden, where I designed and implemented a hydroponics system, responsible for growing our produce for events. This system is driven by a Raspberry Pi, which I programmed to provide real-time control, monitoring, and optimization of the growing conditions. This digital farm management not only ensures the quality and freshness of our produce, but also encapsulates our vision of integrating technology and sustainability in urban agriculture.
projects.zh_notes: 与我的妻子合作，我们购买了一块8000平方英尺的土地，并着手将其改造成一个城市农场到餐桌的活动空间。我们项目的核心是花园，我在那里设计并实施了一个水培系统，负责为活动种植我们的农产品。该系统由树莓派驱动，我编程实现了对生长条件的实时控制、监测和优化。这种数字农场管理不仅确保了我们农产品的质量和新鲜度，还体现了我们将技术和可持续性融入城市农业的愿景。

projects.name: Mama's Gotchu
projects.notes: When COVID19 hit, my chef friends had to shutter their catering business. To survive, they started doing meal deliveries. Operations and customer management was a nightmare and so I led a team of 3 engineers to build out a kitchen operations management web application for them. At its peak we had 60+ customers and regularly delivered ~130 meals every week! Built with Typescript, React, Twilio, Apollo (GraphQL) and Serverless.
projects.zh_notes: 当COVID19爆发时，我的厨师朋友们不得不关闭他们的餐饮业务。为了生存，他们开始提供餐食配送服务。运营和客户管理是一场噩梦，因此我带领一个由3名工程师组成的团队为他们构建了一个厨房运营管理Web应用程序。在巅峰时期，我们拥有60多名客户，每周定期配送约130份餐食！使用Typescript、React、Twilio、Apollo（GraphQL）和Serverless构建。

experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
accomplishments: Recognized the inefficiencies of having ~300 GitHub repositories and developers working in silos; proposed and led the transition to a monorepo using the NX framework, resulting in a significant increase in engineering velocity and enabling ~10 releases per day, up from once a month. The move to the monorepo also had a significant cultural impact as it was instrumental in helping the engineering team stay positive, productive and collaborative during a turbulent time.

Led the 'replatforming' initiative at Sweetgreen, transitioning from native development (iOS / Android) and the Ember web framework to React Native over a period of ~1 year. This transition not only yielded massive productivity gains for developers but also drastically improved our customer's experience, as evidenced by our Android app rating improving from 1 star to 5 stars in the Google Play Store.

Utilizing the Serverless framework, extracted the most heavily used API, location search, from our monolith backend into its own service. This dramatically reduced latency times for customers searching for a Sweetgreen location, significantly enhancing the customer experience.
zh_accomplishments: 意识到拥有约300个GitHub仓库和开发人员在孤岛中工作的低效率；提出并领导使用NX框架过渡到单一代码库，显著提高了工程速度，使每日发布量从每月一次增加到约10次。向单一代码库的转变也产生了重大的文化影响，在动荡时期帮助工程团队保持积极、高效和协作。
领导Sweetgreen的'重新平台化'计划，在约1年的时间内从原生开发（iOS/Android）和Ember网络框架过渡到React Native。这一转变不仅为开发人员带来了巨大的生产力提升，还大幅改善了客户体验，我们的Android应用在Google Play商店的评级从1星提升至5星就是明证。
利用Serverless框架，将使用最频繁的API——位置搜索从我们的单体后端提取到独立服务中。这显著减少了客户搜索Sweetgreen位置的延迟时间，极大地提升了客户体验。
